activities: HDPlus develops, installs, supports, and markets a full suite of business and IT management software including disaster recovery and business continuity modules.
personaldata: Any privacy data entered by orgazations (customers) locaed in Europe
recoursemech: With respect to any complaints relating to the HDPLUS Technologies Privacy Policy that cannot be resolved through HDPLUS's internal processes, HDPLUS has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the Panel established by the EU Data Protection Authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor principles. In the event that HDPLUS or such Authorities determines that HDPLUS did not comply with this Policy, HDPLUS will take appropriate steps to address any adverse effects and to promote future compliance.
